channel.title: Good Old Scar =] someone can help out?
channel.description: hey fellas quick question i found a version of scar i just wanted to test it on Rsc classic i got it to work and have a script that works so i know it can still be used do you know know where i can find some scar scripts that can be used on rs classic i tried searching but no look

item.title: Good Old Scar =] someone can help out?
item.dc:creator: @zader555 zader555
item.description:
@zader555 wrote:

how do i enable viewing of the archived section. lol

and i likearryas post your link to the scar scripts much appreciated
i know they work because i have two so far that work but i cant find more for rsc just rs2

Read full topic

@NewbieNewty wrote:

You could always write your own though. Alternatively check out the villavu forums.
